building.description: filter by building name. Only works if building ID is not present

custom_fields_and.description: filter by custom fields, and filter, format of key1:value1,key2:value2

custom_fields_or.description: filter by custom fields, or filter, format of key1:value1,key2:value2

first_added_gt.description: first added greater date YYYY-MM-DD format

first_added_lt.description: first added less than date YYYY-MM-DD format

hardware.description: filter by name of hardware model, comma separated for multiple hardware models (or filter).

hardware_ids.description: filter by ID of hardware models, comma separated

in_service.description: filter by whether in service or not. Use yes or no.

is_it_blade_host.description: filter by whether blade host or not. Use yes or no.

is_it_switch.description: filter by whether switch or not. Use yes or no.

is_it_virtual_host.description: filter by whether virtual host or not. Use yes or no.

last_updated_gt.description: last updated greater than date YYYY-MM-DD format

last_updated_lt.description: last updated less than date YYYY-MM-DD format

rack.description: filter by rack name. Only works if rack ID is not present

room.description: filter by room name. Only works if room ID is not present

tags.description: filter by tags. comma separated for multiple tags (This is an OR filter, gets all the devices for all comma separated tags)

tags_and.description: filter by all the tags, separated by comma. (This is an AND filter and all tags have to match for filter)

type.description: filter by device type (physical, virtual, blade, other, cluster or unknown)
